import React, {useContext, useState} from "react"; import {FormDispatchContext, FormStateContext} from "../FormContext"; const SelectForm = () => { const dispatch = useContext(FormDispatchContext); const [seletedForm, setSelectedForm] = useState('no-transaction') const handleInputChange = (e) => { setSelectedForm(e.target.value) } const handleNext = () => { dispatch({ type: 'SET_FORM_TYPE', payload: seletedForm }) } return ( <>

Wybierz Formularz

) } export default SelectForm
